title: Ademola Lookman joins RB Leipzig on loan from Everton
description: Everton have allowed Ademola Lookman to join Bundesliga side RB Leipzig on loan until the end of the season.
content: Lookman has made 16 appearances for the Toffees this season, primarily in the cup competitions, and will now continue his development with Leipzig, who finished runners-up to Bayern Munich in the Bundesliga last season.Everton confirmed the loan deal in a statement on Wednesday, which read: "Everton winger Ademola Lookman will spend the rest of the 2017/18 season with RB Leipzig after sealing a loan move to the high-flying Bundesliga club."Lookman joined the Blues 12 months ago from League One Charlton Athletic and scored on his debut in the 4-0 Goodison Park victory over Manchester City."The England Under-21 international has agreed a deal to keep him in Germany until 30 June and joins a Leipzig team sitting fifth in the league, one point outside the top four and a Champions League qualification spot."Lookman could make his debut for Leipzig on Saturday when Ralph Hasenhuttl's side travel to face Borussia Monchengladbach in the Bundesliga.Get Sky Sports from Â£18 a month and watch the latest transfers live in action for their new teams.
